name: Forest Fire (lukebandy)
description:
A forest fire is rapidly spreading, but only you can put it out with your unreliable firefighting plane! Steer the plane over fires to put them out using the W & D keys, then use the mouse to fix any issues with your plane.

This game was made very quickly as a solo project for the GMTK 2020 Jam (the theme of which is 'Out of Control')  so the graphics are very MVP and there is no audio. Frankly, I wanted to go out and enjoy the sun rather than sit at my desk.
